channel.title: Problem Set on Allison's Blog for STA304
channel.description: Recent content in Problem Set on Allison's Blog for STA304

item.title: Analysis of Travel and Medical Policies on Covid Cases in Toronto
item.description: Abstract Covid-19 emerged suddenly in 2020 and into a society where a global pandemic was not thought to be a high concern, and as a result different countries implementing different measures to handle the new disease that was quickly spreading around the globe. In this blog post, we will explore the effectiveness of the policies implemented by the Canadian and Ontario government at reducing the impact of Covid-19 by looking at data of cases in Toronto.
